title: [Gameplay] Mana Bar Flashes When Selecting Something Without Mana
body: Highlighting something that doesn't have a mana bar (towers, rift scuttler, etc) makes the blue texture of the mana bar in the upper-left preview not only apparent but appears in a bugged way and violently flashes! This happens on every map, but was only tested on things that have _no_ mana instead of _missing_ mana.

replies.body: when will it be fix anybody know
Same here! I actually contacted Riot support about it, they delegated me to this forum. Good to know it's not just me!

yeah noticed this day of the patch.
i just learned to ignore it.
